q: If successful, Katie Price would join Louis Walsh , Dannii Minogue and Cheryl Cole on the show and Simon Cowell 's ex-girlfriend and show mentor Sinitta thinks she will be a great choice. Comment on this Article She said: Having Katie Price on the panel would make interesting viewing, so I can definitely see it working. She can do anything she puts her mind to. She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid- faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .
